name: Kani (itch)
description:
Survive waves of enemies, have fun with the funky physics and kill people with different weapons!

  • Shooting is automatic - you got no control over it. You can (and should) use the recoil of your gun to move around.
  • Shoot med kits to heal and crates for new weapons. You don't control what weapons you get from them. The red number in the top-left corner shows how much HP you have left.
  • There's 3 different maps, and no, you can't control which one you play in
  • You can melee enemies by simply hitting them with your body
  • Starring: rabbit, 2 enemy types and explosive barrels

Good luck, have fun!

Music made by Illya Chan
